ygData.subject: Re: NBW or Disney, you decide
ygData.msgSnippet: *gets really mad at the evil typo demon for entering and messing up the posts, gets out holy mech oil and sprinkles some on all the keyboards and computers,

*gets really mad at the evil typo demon for entering and messing up 
the posts, gets out holy mech oil and sprinkles some on all the 
keyboards and computers, then recites a prayer from the book of  
PRIMUS. Book of Hound, verses 4-7* 

And he cast his illusions and holograms. Making the evil typo deoms 
believe that he was truely outnumbered.  The evil typo demon tried 
again to corrupt the posts of the those loyal to the RPG. And the 
holograms were cast again, surrounding the demon. The evil typo demon 
fled in fear to another RPG and left the those of the true RPG alone.

This concludes the reading of the book of Primus. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> Umm you spelled chuckling wrong.
